block:
Gets the currently active filter tab in the chatbox.

Note: This is a read-only method and does not update game frames.
block (2): Note: This is a read-only method and does not update game frames.

block:
Opens the specified filter tab in the chatbox.

Note: This method updates game frames while running and waits until the UI reflects the requested state (or an internal timeout elapses). Returns false if the control is not visible, cannot be tapped, or the state did not confirm in time.
block (2): Note: This method updates game frames while running and waits until the UI reflects the requested state (or an internal timeout elapses). Returns false if the control is not visible, cannot be tapped, or the state did not confirm in time.

block:
Gets the username of the player currently logged into the game.

Note: This is a read-only method and does not update game frames.
block (2): Note: This is a read-only method and does not update game frames.
notes (2): The player's username as a String.

block:
Gets the bounding rectangle of the username display area in the chatbox.

Note: This is a read-only method and does not update game frames.
block (2): Note: This is a read-only method and does not update game frames.
notes (2): A Rectangle representing the bounds of the username area.

block:
Retrieves the text messages currently displayed in the chatbox.

Note: This is a read-only method and does not update game frames.
block (2): Note: This is a read-only method and does not update game frames.
notes (2): A UIResultList containing the chatbox messages as Strings.

block: Adds a font color to the chatbox's font color list, allowing messages with this color to be recognized by getText().
notes (2): color - The color value to add.
